Text: Thank you TvTeam, this show blew my mind!
Thanks for making this available! Wondering if you could make a smaller version available for those of us with slow connections?

Classification: Scripted
Genre: Discovery/Science | Fantasy | Mystery
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 15, 2013
Episode Order: 6

Utopia is a new upcoming drama on Channel 4 which will follow a shadowy unit called The Network and a strange graphic novel.
